title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

In olden days courting benches were employed by protective fathers to maintain their daughters' virtuousity. [from the Linda Anderson catalog. Submitted by Alice Batchelor, Falmouth, MA.]
